title: Ep. 189 "Check Your Privilege"
description:
Continue the conversation at home, with friends, with family, and with us. If you need more information on how to get involved, here's a few sites. Leave a comment if you can to share more information.

xoxo
Kiki & Medinah

Voter Information (What’s on your ballot?) https://www.vote411.org/

Bail Funds: https://bailfunds.github.io/

The Bail Project: https://bailproject.org/

ACLU Know Your Rights (Protests): http://tiny.cc/0qsaqz

BLM For More Information, toolkits, and other resources: https://blacklivesmatter.com/
